Name: IS_MOD_ENABLED
Description: Returns 1 if a mod is enabled, 0 otherwise.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Name: GET_CONFIG_INT_VALUE
Description: Returns the value of a config option as an int. If config file or schema cannot be found, returns 0.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Parameters.Name: configId
Parameters.Description: ID of a config value as seen in a mod's Config.json or data.yaml, or in its source code or ReMIX schema.

Name: GET_CONFIG_FLOAT_VALUE
Description: Returns the value of a config option as a float. If config file or schema cannot be found, returns 0.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Parameters.Name: configId
Parameters.Description: ID of a config value as seen in a mod's Config.json or data.yaml, or in its source code or ReMIX schema.

Name: CMM_GET_IN_USE_ID
Description: Returns the id currently in use for a Confidant. For use with female Confidants. Returns -1 if Confidant has not been started.

Parameters.Name: commuId
Parameters.Description: Confidant's id as seen in CMM.BIN.

Name: SUM_ITEM_ID
Description: Returns an item's true id, given its section and relative id within that section.

Parameters.Name: section
Parameters.Description: A number representing the item's section. (0 = melee weapons, 1 = armor, 2 = accessories, 3 = consumables, 4 = key items, 5 = sellable loot, 6 = skill cards, 7 = outfits, 8 = guns)

Parameters.Name: idInSection
Parameters.Description: Item's relative id within a section (eg. 5 for section and 105 for idInSection will give marble chessboard id).
